abstract: The company plans to add lightweight carbon-composite wings and new engines to the popular 777 model.
snippet: The company plans to add lightweight carbon-composite wings and new engines to the popular 777 model.
lead_paragraph: Boeing is likely to seek approval from its board as early as next month to start taking orders for an updated version of its 777 passenger jet, industry officials said Monday.

headline.main: Boeing Seeks Approval for Updated Jet
headline.print_headline: Boeing Seeks Approval for Updated Jet
